name: F-Prot Wrapper for E-Mail Virus Checking
short_description: F-Prot Anti-Virus Wrapper is a Perl script which works in conjunction with Procmail to detect E-Mail viruses before they reach into your mailbox. It can easily be integrated into any MTA (such as QMail) for system wide virus checking.
